ValidationRule.description: Product sector must belong to Claim sector. This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(CONTAINS(Product__r.Sectors_Text__c, TEXT(Sector__c) )), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Product Sector does not belong to the Claim Sector
